definition: fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
lit. ashes burn once more (idiom); fig. sb lost returns to have influence/sth malevolent returns to haunt one
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
head and face filthy with grime (idiom)/covered in dirt/dejected and depressed

sentences.english: I learned to live when I thought it better to die …
sentences.chinese: 萬念懼灰的時候，我學會了生存。

sentences.english: He turned to look. He saw a 7-foot grizzly bear charge towards him.
sentences.chinese: 他轉身一看，看見一隻7英尺高的灰熊向他衝來。

sentences.english: Lan Yangyang sent the letter to Hui Tailang by mistake yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天懶羊羊把信錯送給了灰太狼。

sentences.english: Even Grandin’s own hug machine is now gathering dust.
sentences.chinese: 甚至格蘭丁自己的擁抱機也鋪了一層灰。

sentences.english: City sights, neon lights, grey skys or blue.
sentences.chinese: 都市景色，霓虹燈光，灰或藍天。

sentences.english: After his fall the boy rose and dusted himself down.
sentences.chinese: 男孩摔倒後爬起來把身上的灰拍掉。

sentences.english: Bynum was injured Jan. 13 against Memphis.
sentences.chinese: 拜納姆在1月13日與灰熊的比賽中受傷。

sentences.english: if you are a melancholic soul, it seems always cloudy.
sentences.chinese: 如果你心裏陰雲密佈，天就總是灰的。

sentences.english: The canyons were alive with gray parrots having a ball. They seemed to love listening to their echoes.
sentences.chinese: 灰鸚鵡歡叫着，自戀地聽着回聲，峽谷一派生意盎然。

sentences.english: Suitable content of gypsum will be helpful to improve the strength of the soft soil solidified by the cement.
sentences.chinese: 適量的石膏摻入也有利於窯灰水泥固化土強度的提高。

sentences.english: The most widely used polio vaccine contains a live virus.
sentences.chinese: 最廣泛使用的脊灰疫苗含有活病毒。

sentences.english: In my dream, I not only met Lazy Sheep but also Big Big Wolf.
sentences.chinese: 夢中，我不僅見到了懶羊羊，還遇到了灰太狼。

sentences.english: Right now I am writing my own "Pleasant Goat and Big Bad Wolf" story.
sentences.chinese: 我現在在自己編《喜羊羊與灰太狼》的故事。

sentences.english: He loved to wear grey-blue clothes.
sentences.chinese: 他喜歡穿灰藍色的衣服。

sentences.english: I know the cartoon movie Happy sheep and Gray wolf, while, I have never heard of Li Zhengjiang.
sentences.chinese: 我知道喜羊羊和灰太狼，這個李正江真的沒聽過。

sentences.english: To brighten your heart when the gray shadows fall.
sentences.chinese: 在灰霾降臨時點亮你的心靈。

definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
brown/gray or dark color/coarse hemp cloth/Taiwan pr. [he2]
abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
